message: Cannot combine AUTOINCREMENT and multiple primary keys in SQLite.
details:
[01-Jun-2025 22:50:43 UTC] WordPress database error

CREATE TABLE wp_camCallDetails ( id INT(9) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, image_color VARCHAR(40) NOT NULL, image_link VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY id (id) );

  1. Executing: BEGIN | (no parameters)
